thread.section_title: BullionVault Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BullionVault | www.bullionvault.com
thread.title: Reynaldo Saga

author: Reynaldo Saga
title: Reynaldo Saga
text: Had bought gold several times with no hassle at all. Had a liitle problem with one of my transaction(my on doing) and had to contact them to resolve the problem. No roblem at all with regards to their service. Had sold and withdrawn funds in about 5 mins. That's how easy it was. I would not hesitate to buy gold again when i had enough capital to invest. At least a million dollars.
